title: Launch Client
body: Why does the launch client still say shit about the new client being rolled out? Is there something i have to do for it to not do this? I thought showing the f2p champs and the patch notes in the launch client very helpful. (Sorry if this is the wrong sector to post in)

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm looking at my own client now and I'm not seeing any current updates talking about the new client being rolled out still. It's been awhile since then so I'm not sure why you're still having that article shown on the launcher. It might just need a simple refresh by closing and opening it again. If that doesn't get it and you still want those articles to be refreshed, I'd go ahead and try doing a quick repair through the client options.
gave both a try and it didnt work, got any other ideas sir?

Oh, so you're actually getting that popup every time but you don't have to run through the actual update process? Weeeeiiiiiiiird.....

Let's try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with the option **Force Repatch** turned on. That should make the client run through the latest patch again which will hopefully tell that client update that its job is done.
Unfortunately this didnt work either. feelsbadman

Well snap. That client update window shouldn't affect anything too bad as long as you're still able to get past it and into the actual client. If it's bothering you too much, go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to see exactly why it keeps showing up for you.
i already went through the latest patch, its been like this for months. I just always thought you guys didnt bother changing it. but ill give the tool a try and reply again soon
